backend/main.mo: Defines the backend actor with access control, blob storage mixins, and data models for benches, documents, components, history, and user profiles, plus query methods like getAllTestBenches.
feature_evidence.json: Contains a feature evidence report describing added UI language support and listing related files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides prewritten summaries of numerous frontend files including components, pages, hooks, utils, and styles.
frontend/index.css: Defines global Tailwind layers and OKLCH-based color variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML document that loads the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up routing, query client, theming, i18n provider, and protected vs public route handling with AppShell and error boundary.
Checks admin status via useIsCallerAdmin and conditionally renders loading, access denied, or wrapped content with i18n messages.
frontend/src/components/AppErrorBoundary: React error boundary that displays a styled error alert with reload option when rendering fails.
frontend/src/components/auth/ActorGate.t: Ensures backend actor initialization and shows loading or connection error states before rendering children.
frontend/src/components/auth/AuthGate.ts: Handles Internet Identity authentication, redirecting unauthenticated users to sign-in and showing inline login UI if needed.
frontend/src/components/dnd/DraggableLis: Reusable drag‑and‑drop list component supporting drag events, reordering callbacks, and custom item rendering.
frontend/src/components/dnd/useDraggable: Provides a hook to manage drag-and-drop reordering of a list with handlers for drag events and resetting order.
Defines the main application layout with navigation, theming, admin-aware links, and a user menu with sign-out logic.
frontend/src/components/navigation/Scrol: Shows buttons to scroll to top or bottom based on scroll position and provides smooth scrolling handlers.
frontend/src/components/profile/EntityTa: Implements an input for selecting or typing a single entity tag with suggestions, add/remove logic, and validation UI.
frontend/src/components/profile/Predefin: Renders a grid of selectable predefined avatars using provided IDs and highlights the selected one.
frontend/src/components/profile/UserAvat: Displays a user avatar from predefined or custom sources with cache-busting support and size variations.
frontend/src/components/theme/ThemeToggl: A button that toggles the theme between light and dark using next-themes.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor, refreshing dependent queries when identity changes.
Provides a Zustand store with a timestamp used to force avatar image cache refreshes.
frontend/src/hooks/useDashboardChartType: Stores and persists the user’s preferred dashboard chart type in localStorage.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity authentication context, managing login, logout, identity loading, and status tracking.
Periodically calls an actor method to update the user’s last-seen timestamp when authenticated.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks for loading and mutating backend data such as test benches, user profiles, roles, and preferences.
frontend/src/i18n/I18nProvider.tsx: Implements an i18n context that loads and persists the user's language preference using backend data and localStorage.
frontend/src/i18n/languages.ts: Defines supported language metadata and helper functions for validating and retrieving language names and flags.
frontend/src/i18n/translations.ts: Declares all translation keys used throughout the UI.
frontend/src/i18n/useI18n.ts: Exposes translation helpers and current language state from the i18n context.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind base styles and CSS variables for themes including dark mode.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/Admin/AdminPage.tsx: Renders the admin dashboard with tabs for benches, documents, and user management.
frontend/src/pages/Admin/components/Admi: Displays all test benches for admins with loading state and deletion workflow.
Lists all documents with metadata and allows downloading each, showing loading and empty states.
Displays the current user's profile including expiration preferences and dashboard settings, with loading and missing-profile handling.
frontend/src/pages/Benches/BenchDetailPa: Shows detailed information for a bench, including components, documents, history, and supports editing, duplication, and removal.
frontend/src/pages/Benches/BenchListPage: Displays a searchable list of test benches with photos and supports adding new benches.
frontend/src/pages/Benches/components/Ad: Modal form for creating a new test bench with fields for metadata, photo upload, documents, components, and duplication options.
frontend/src/pages/Benches/components/Be: Provides a table UI to add, edit, delete, and duplicate bench components with expiration status calculation.
Manages uploading, listing, versioning, and deleting documents associated with a bench.
Displays a chronological list of bench history entries with user info and timestamps.
Renders a bench photo with loading and fallback behavior on error.
frontend/src/pages/Benches/components/Do: Allows selecting document categories and attaching files with versions for each category.
frontend/src/pages/Benches/components/Du: Dialog for selecting benches to duplicate a component to, handling submission and validation.
frontend/src/pages/Benches/components/Ed: Modal form for editing a test bench, handling validation, photo upload, tag management, and submitting updates via mutation.
frontend/src/pages/Benches/components/Ta: Tag input component allowing adding, removing, and selecting tags with suggestions and keyboard support.
Placeholder page describing planned features for creating a new test bench.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard/components/: Displays a pie chart summarizing component expiration statuses (ok, expiring soon, expired) across benches.
Renders a bar chart showing per-bench counts of components by expiration status.
Generates a bar chart grouping components by expiration date ranges to show upcoming deadlines.
Pie chart showing document counts grouped by category such as Hardware, Software, or Other.
Displays monthly expiration counts using either a bar or line chart to show expiration trends over time.
Renders a bar or line chart showing expired component counts per bench, using expiration thresholds and i18n labels.
Computes overall component health distribution and displays percentages with progress bars.
Defines draggable dashboard statistic and chart cards and manages their order and rendering.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Main dashboard page that loads benches, components, documents, user profile, and displays statistics, charts, and actions.
frontend/src/pages/ProfilePage.tsx: User profile management page handling personal info, thresholds, avatar selection, language, and saving preferences.
frontend/src/pages/SignInPage.tsx: Sign‑in page using Internet Identity flow with status handling and redirect on authentication.
frontend/src/utils/avatars.ts: Maps avatar IDs to image paths and provides helpers to retrieve paths and list available avatars.
frontend/src/utils/blobUpload.ts: Uploads a file as an ExternalBlob with optional progress tracking.
frontend/src/utils/defaultBenchPhoto.ts: Loads and converts a default bench placeholder image into an ExternalBlob.
frontend/src/utils/download.ts: Provides a function to fetch bytes from an ExternalBlob and trigger a browser file download.
frontend/src/utils/errors.ts: Normalizes unknown error values into readable messages, preserving backend-provided text when possible.
frontend/src/utils/expirationSettings.ts: Manages expiration-threshold settings with localStorage fallback and computes expiration status for dates.
frontend/src/utils/id.ts: Generates a unique string ID using the current timestamp and random characters.
frontend/src/utils/rewriteDescription.ts: Performs deterministic cleanup and formatting of bench descriptions, including capitalization and abbreviation normalization.
frontend/src/utils/search.ts: Filters test benches by matching search terms against name, agile code, description, and tags.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, storing, and persisting URL parameters, including support for hash-based routing.
frontend/src/utils/validation.ts: Provides validation helpers for email, domain-restricted email, AGILE codes, semantic versions, and URLs.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind CSS theme, colors, fonts, animations, and plugins for the frontend.
frontend/tsconfig.node.json: TypeScript config for Node-specific build files using ESNext modules and bundler resolution.
frontend/vite.config.ts: Sets up Vite with React, environment variable support, path aliasing, dev server proxying, and build options.
project_state.json: Describes current project state, known issues, and feature requests related to localization and added languages.
